name: Mad Hat Dash
description:
You are a robot who's purpose is to be a waiter to passengers on the Mad Hat Express. However, you hate your job. For every customer you interact with, your anger and dislike towards your job increases. Make sure to blow off steam so you don't blow up, but be careful not to blow off steam in front of the customers. They don't appreciate that.

Important Notes:

  • You can only hold 5 orders at a time.
  • You can hold infinite dishes at a time.
  • Avoid your bar from hitting maximum anger.

* There's no title menu, or tutorial, because I ran out of time.*

CONTROLS

Z - Object Interact

X - Blow Steam

Arrow Left & Right -  Movement
